statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, survey_date FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, feedback FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score <= 2 AND feedback LIKE '%poor%';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM survey_responses WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND feedback LIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(response_id) > 1 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT response_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC,survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_level FROM survey_responses;
SELECT response_id, customer_name, satisfaction_level FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT question_text FROM survey_questions;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM survey_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level > 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_level FROM survey_responses WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY satisfaction_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY customer_name HAVING COUNT(response_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;

SELECT q.question_text, r.customer_name FROM survey_questions q JOIN survey_responses r ON q.question_id = r.response_id WHERE r.satisfaction_level < 3 ORDER BY q.question_text ASC, r.customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, satisfaction_level, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level > 4 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM surveys JOIN survey_responses ON surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.response_id GROUP BY survey_name;
SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email, survey_responses.response_date FROM customers INNER JOIN survey_responses ON customers.customer_id = survey_responses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE customer_id = 101 AND satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_level < 2);
SELECT * FROM responses;
SELECT response_id, rating, response_text FROM responses WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_id, customer_id, rating_value FROM ratings WHERE rating_value = 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, rating_value FROM surveys JOIN ratings ON surveys.survey_id = ratings.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY response_id DESC;

SELECT responses.response_id, customers.customer_name, ratings.rating_value FROM responses JOIN customers ON responses.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN ratings ON responses.customer_id = ratings.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM surveys WHERE survey_id < 5;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions ORDER BY question_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT customer_id, survey_id, response_date FROM survey_responses WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT question_text, question_type FROM questions ORDER BY question_id ASC;
